SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Game model class to be used as a representation of the game's state by the controller

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    Disambiguation enum for the common goals

    GameModel's' custom gson deserializer

    GameModel's custom gson serializer

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int numPlayers, int commonGoalX, int commonGoalY)
      Initialize an empty model for the given number of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players for the game
      commonGoalX - id for the first common goal
      commonGoalY - id for the second common goal

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int numPlayers, int commonGoalNumX, int commonGoalNumY, Stack<Integer> CGXS, Stack<Integer> CGYS, Board board, TileBag tileBag)
      Initilize a model from the entire state of the game.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players for the game
      commonGoalNumX - id for the first common goal
      commonGoalNumY - id for the second common goal
      CGXS - stack of scores for the first common goal
      CGYS - stack of scores for the second common goal
      board - board of the game
      tileBag - tile bag of the game

  • Method Details

    • setGameEnded

      public void setGameEnded(boolean b)
      Set the game-ended status.
      Parameters:
      b - true if the game should end, false otherwise

    • getGameEnded

      public boolean getGameEnded()
      Get the game-ended status.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Notify all listeners of the start of the game

    • getCommonGoalX

      public int getCommonGoalX()
      Get id of first common goal
      Returns:
      integer id of first common goal

    • getCommonGoalY

      public int getCommonGoalY()
      Get id of second common goal
      Returns:
      integer id of second common goal

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Get number of participating players
      Returns:
      number of players

    • popStackCGX

      public int popStackCGX()
      Pops the score from the top of the score stack for the first common goal
      Returns:
      integer value of first common goal score

    • popStackCGY

      public int popStackCGY()
      Pops the score from the top of the score stack for the second common goal
      Returns:
      integer value of second common goal score

    • setLastTurn

      public void setLastTurn()
      Set the game state to LastTurn. Assigns the current player the bonus point for finishing first.

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Check if it's the last turn
      Returns:
      true if it's the last turn, false otherwise

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname, int pgID)
      Adds player with given nickname and personal goal to the player pool It is the controller's duty to avoid nickname duplicates and not add too many players
      Parameters:
      nickname - Unique string nickname of the player
      pgID - Integer ID for the player's personal goal

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns the entire player list
      Internal player indices are guaranteed to be consistent with the ones from this list.
      Returns:
      Full list of players

    • getNicknames

      public List<String> getNicknames()
      Returns the list of player nicknames
      Returns:
      Full list of player nicknames

    • getCurrentPlayerIndex

      public int getCurrentPlayerIndex()
      Return the index of the current player in the list returned by getPlayers
      Returns:
      The index of the current player

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Return the current player
      Returns:
      The current player

    • setCurrentPlayerIndex

      public void setCurrentPlayerIndex(int currentPlayerIndex)
      Set the current player index
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerIndex - new index of the current player

    • addCurrentPlayerCommongGoalScore

      public void addCurrentPlayerCommongGoalScore(int score, GameModel.CGType t)
      Adds given score to the current player's common goal score.
      Notifies all listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      score - Integer score to give the current player
      t - CGType of the common goal to add the score to

    • setCurrentPlayerPersonalScore

      public void setCurrentPlayerPersonalScore(int score)
      Set the new score for the current player's personal goal.
      Notifies all listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      score - Integer score to give the current player

    • setCurrentPlayerAdjacencyScore

      public void setCurrentPlayerAdjacencyScore(int score)
      Set the new score for the current player's adjacency score.
      Notifies all listeners of the change.
      Parameters:
      score - Integer score to give the current player

    • refillBoard

      public void refillBoard()
      Performa a board refill and notify all listeners of the new board.

    • getTileAmount

      public int getTileAmount(Tile tile)
      Gets the amount of tiles left in play for the given type of tile.
      Parameters:
      tile - Type of tile to check
      Returns:
      Amount of tile left (counts both bag and board)
      Throws:
      ClassCastException - if used with Tile.NOTILE

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(Coordinate coordinate)
      Get tile on the board at the given coordinate
      Parameters:
      coordinate - Coordinate on board to check
      Returns:
      Tile at coordinate, or null if the coordinate is not on the board

    • getAllCoordinates

      public List<Coordinate> getAllCoordinates()
      Gets the list of all legal coordinates of the board, regardless of their contents.
      Returns:
      List of all legal coordinates

    • getOccupied

      public List<Coordinate> getOccupied()
      Get the list of all coordinates of the board which are not empty
      Returns:
      List of all non-empty coordinates

    • insertTile

      public void insertTile(Coordinate coordinates, Tile tile) throws OccupiedTileException, OutOfBoundCoordinateException
      Insert the given tile at the given coordinate on the board.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinate at which to insert the tile
      tile - Tile type to insert
      Throws:
      OccupiedTileException - Trying to insert a tile in an already occupied position
      OutOfBoundCoordinateException - Trying to insert a tile in an invalid position

    • removeSelection

      public void removeSelection(List<Coordinate> selection)
      Remove tiles at the selected coordinates from the board. Notifies all listeners of the board change.
      Parameters:
      selection - List of coordinates to remove tiles from

    • shelveSelection

      public void shelveSelection(List<Tile> orderedTiles, int column)
      Shelves the given list of tiles on the current player's shelf at the given column.
      Assumes that the column has enough space for the entire list.
      Notifies all listeners of the shelf change.
      Parameters:
      orderedTiles - List of tiles to put on shelf, from first to last
      column - Column of the shelf to insert the tiles at

    • addListener

      public void addListener(String name, ModelListener listener)
      Add a listener to the model (or reset the listener with the given name).
      At least one listener for each player should be supplied.
      Parameters:
      name - Listener name, should be the nickname for listeners relaying information to clients
      listener - Reference to the listener

    • chatBroker

      public void chatBroker(ChatMessage chat)
      Broker a chat message to the correct client.
      Parameters:
      chat - Message to be sent.

    • notifyWinner

      public void notifyWinner()
      Notify the clients of the end of the game.
      Sends the nickname of the winner and the leaderboard to all clients.

    • notifyServerMessage

      public void notifyServerMessage(String listenerName, ServerResponseMessage msg)
      Notify the client with the given nickname with a server message.
      Parameters:
      listenerName - Name of the listener to notify
      msg - Server Response Message to send

    • peekStackCGX

      public int peekStackCGX()
      Peek the top of the CGX score stack.
      Returns:
      The top of the stack, or 0 if the stack is empty.

    • peekStackCGY

      public int peekStackCGY()
      Peek the top of the CGY score stack.
      Returns:
      The top of the stack, or 0 if the stack is empty.

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Get the entire Board object.
      Returns:
      The Board object.

    • getTileBag

      public TileBag getTileBag()
      Get the TileBag object.
      Returns:
      The TileBag object.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Add an already created player to the game. (used to restore a game from a save file)
      Parameters:
      player - The player to add.

    • toJson

      public String toJson()
      Return the json serialization of the object.
      Returns:
      The state of the GameModel object in a json-formatted string

    • toJson

      public void toJson(String path) throws IOException
      Write the serialized json string of the object directly to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to file to be written
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occur while writing the file
